title: Is it possible find connected WiFi history? - Quora

response.answer_text: by connected wifi history what do you mean. are you asking this question in case of a router or are you asking the question to know which wifi points had you have had connected previoosly. for the router see the logs in the routers settings page while for wifis that you have connected to you can view the logs too but i forgot where it was stored. By the way you could always get the password to a wifi point through control panel or some application
